title: Building synergy
creator_credit: R and R Productions and Ron V. Brown
brief_description: Outlines the co-operative action in Victoria between schools and the community for use of facilities such as halls, libraries and theatres. Schools designed with community use in mind are working very successfully, with co-ordination of facilities between school and community. Suitable for teachers and tertiary level.
